title: Happy Holidays 2009
body: This is the real Dan speaking. I haven't written much over the last six months, but I'm here today to wish you all a happy holiday, and to post a picture of Jasper (b/c that's what dad's do). Eat your heart out!
author: Dan

comments.author: vernongetzler
comments.body: happy holidays from my side too...Cute Baby.. ======================================== albert pinto internet marketing forum
